GapFillInput.Title: Nouns and adjectives
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the word in brackets at the end of the sentence into the correct form.

Content.Question:
1. My cat’s very intelligent. I’m sure he understands everything I say. (intelligence)
2. The book is full of imaginative pictures. (imagination)
3. Happiness is the most important thing in life. (happy)
4. Titanic was the most successful film of the 1990s. (success)
5. You need determination to get to the top in this job. (determined)
6. There’s a good possibility that we’re going to change all the computers. (possible)
7. How ambitious are you? (ambition)
8. I don’t have much confidence in my ability to speak in public. (confident)
9. Jake was jealous of his friend’s success. (jealousy)
10. Everyone realised the importance of the meeting. (important)
